short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your pronunciation. Repeat after Forvo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: raf is a browser extension. When you at forvo, there'll be a record/play button at the left corner. You can repeat on your own after listening other's pronunciation. Just click, bla bla and enjoy.
